org.dellroad.stuff.spring
Class ThreadTransactionalAnnotationParser

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.transaction.annotation.SpringTransactionAnnotationParser
      org.dellroad.stuff.spring.ThreadTransactionalAnnotationParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TransactionAnnotationParser
public class ThreadTransactionalAnnotationParser
extends SpringTransactionAnnotationParser

Strategy implementation for parsing the @ThreadTransactional annotation. Works just like SpringTransactionAnnotationParser but parses @ThreadTransactional annotations instead.

See Also:
ThreadTransactional, Serialized Form
